mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (cart_id, product_id, quantity, created_at) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_item_id AS cartItemId, ci.cart_id AS cartId, ci.product_id AS productId, ci.quantity, ci.created_at AS createdAt, ci.updated_at AS updatedAt, p.price, p.discount_rate AS discountRate, p.name, pi.image_url AS imageUrl, c.user_id AS userId FROM cart_items ci JOIN cart c ON ci.cart_id = c.cart_id JOIN products p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN product_images pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id AND pi.is_main_image = 1 WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId}
